heading: Leading Puff
description: Discovering the charm of French puff, layered with Tehzeeb lemon and sparking crystals. It is simple yet classy. Have it with tea or coffee and feel the difference.

heading: French Heart Puff
description: Crispy and sweet, experience a delightful French Heart puff that is perfect for enjoying with your cup of tea.

heading: Parsley Sticks Puff
description: Discover crispy, golden pastry sticks infused with the fresh and herbaceous flavor of parsley, perfect for snacking or  pairing with your favorite dips and spreads.

heading: Butter Puff
description: Butter Puffs are delicate,flaky pasteries made with rich and creamy butter

heading: Vegetable Cheese Pastry
description: A delightful pastry filled with a blend of fresh vegetables and creamy cheese, wrapped in a golden , flaky pastry

heading: Bakarkhani Puff
description: Bakarkhani is a tradition treat that pairs perfectly with tea or coffee for a delightful snack
